        public void testDilateOctagon3x3()
        Dilates a single pixel by a 3x3 octagon, and check the shape of the result. The result should be a 3x3 square (approximation of 3x3 octagon)

      • testErosion_Square4x4

        public void testErosion_Square4x4()
        Erosion of a 4x4 square by a 3x3 octagon should leave only a 2x2 square.

        public void testClosing_5x5()

      • testStabilityByClosing

        public void testStabilityByClosing()
        Considers the image of a single point, and applies a closing. One should get the same image back.

      • testStabilityByOpening

        public void testStabilityByOpening()
        Considers the image of a single point, and applies a closing. One should get the same image back.
